CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - visible absorption spectra of the synthesized polymers in a chloroform solution are shown in Figure 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| the synthesized polymers |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "the synthesized polymers" as they are the materials being referred to in the context of the UV-visible absorption spectra.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| the synthesized polymers |

Explanation:

In the paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "the synthesized polymers" as it is the only explicit reference to a material. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "UV - visible absorption spectra," "chloroform solution," and "Figure 2" are not material names.
